About:
Hi, my name is Boris, and I am currently a student at die Graphische in Vienna.

My area of interest is very wide. From music-arrangements, to photography, vector- and 3D-art, to programming powerful applications in Rust and/or C++. As said, my area of interest is very wide.

As for my skills, you should check out my projects to make a unique image for yourself. Just telling you what I'm able to do will not justify my actual skills to a desired extend.

If you're interested in finding out more about me, you can take a look at my CV or contact me.

Hobbies.title: Hobbies
Hobbies.intro: Hobbies are something that can shape someone’s life very drastically. As for me, I've mixed my something into one big dish that I try to keep in balance. It has been fun so far...

elements.title: Skateboarding
elements.text:
I've been skateboarding since ~2018. It's very frustrating and expensive, but fortunately, it's also very rewarding.

Skateboarding is not a sport in the traditional sense. It allows for creativity, because no one's telling you what to do or how you should do it. For me, it pushed my own creativity to another level.

elements.title: Music
elements.text:
Music's also one of my favourite things to do. I've been obsessed with it since I was 7 years old!

I'm mostly playing piano and percussion. From Frederic Chopin to modern Jazz, I enjoy pretty much any genre.

I am also writing sheet-music for (mostly) piano. If you're intereted, check out my website:

elements.title: Languages
elements.text:
There are tons of languages out there in the wild, and millions of dialects to those as well. Because I grew up in Luxembourg, I got to get a taste of a pack of languages at a very young age.

The languages I currently speak are:

elements.title: Programming
elements.text:
As you’ve already read in my basic introduction, I have not too little knowledge in the art of programming. I've started my programming-journey back in 2014, and I'm looking forward to my future projects every single day!

If you're interested to see the source code of some of my projects, check out my GitHub account: github.com/Vlajd

Also, check out the open-source game engine I'm developing in Rust: github.com/slackers123/engine

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.intro: I am always open to inquiries or questions, so do not hesitate to contact me!
